Name: Energy Supply Station
Title: Energy Supply Station
Desc: Energy Supply Station: Reveals the contents within 2 tiles in a cross shape and permanently gives 1 Construction Permit daily.

Name: Sentry Tower
Title: Sentry Tower
Desc: Sentry Tower: Randomly eradicate 1 Danger Zone within its range.

Name: Supply Depot
Title: Supply Depot
Desc: Supply Depot: Explore the area around Supply Depot to receive Colored Resource +150.

Name: Residential Area
Title: Residential Area
Desc: Residential Area: Action Point +2 daily within this area.

Name: Temporary Base
Title: Temporary Base
Desc: Temporary Base: You can preview 2 tiles in the cross-shaped area. Permanently provides 1 Construction Permit every day. Clears 1 random Danger Zone within range. Areas Within Range of Exploration: Colored Resources +150.
